chapter.title: What the student sees
chapter.para: onCourse has a password free purchasing process meaning that students don't have to remember obsure student identification details from their last enrolment. Where a student has enrolled previously they can move immediately to the payment process, automatically matched to their previous record.

section.title: Student Details
section.para: After a student has selected which class/es they want to enrol in and clicked on the button 'PROCEED TO CHECKOUT' they will see the same page below. All the student need to enter here is their first name, last name and email address.

section.title: Previously Enrolled Students
section.para: If the student enrolling in the class/es has already enrolled in a previous class, (therefore their details are already stored in your database) then after they have entered their first name, last name and email address and clicked on the OK button then it will jump them straight to the summary page.

section.title: New Students
section.para: If this is the first time the student is enrolling then after they have entered their first name, last name and email address it will take them to an additional page where more details need to be captured. All the details on this page can be made mandatory or optional within the CMS setting. As you can see below the only question that is mandatory is their postcode which is marked with a '*' symbol. There is also a marketing question, along with a dropdown for the student to choose whether they have any concessions.

section.title: Adding a Friend
section.para: Once a student has entered all their details they will be directed to a summary page. In this page they have the option of adding another contact/student to this order. The button can be found below the class/es that are being enrolled in and above the field where they can add a promotional code, gift certificate or voucher. If they click on it then it will take them back to the 'YOUR DETAILS' page allowing them to enter the addtional students details.

section.title: Summary
section.para: Once a student has entered all their details they will be directed to a summary page.
This page includes the following information:
* Full name and Email Address of the student/s enrolling or paying
* Price before and after discount of each class along with a total at the bottom right of the page
* A option to add another student (please see the section above called 'Adding a Friend' for more information)
* A field to enter promotional codes, gift certificates or vouchers (more information on this can be found in the Payment Options chapter of the manual)

Once the student has read the summary of information and is happy with the details entered, they can proceed to the payment page by clicking on the 'Proceed to Payment' button at the bottom of the page.

section.title: Adding a Parent or Guardian
section.para: Within the CMS, if you have choosen whether a student below a certain age needs to supply their Guardian or Parents details then they will see a similiar screen as shown below. In the example below, student Alicia Badgery, is trying to enrol in 'Course 22435' however since she is below a certain age the following message appears at the bottom of the page 'We require the details of a parent of guardian for billing and emergency conatct.' They will also not have an option to proceed to the payment screen, however instead the button changes to say 'Add parent or guardian'. They will also notice that there is a new step at the top of the page called 'PARENT'. Once they have clicked on the 'Add parent or guardian' button then they will be directed to the same initial 'YOUR DETAILS' page where the parent or guardian can enter their details.

caption.para: What happens when a student is below a certain age and needs to add their parent or guardian details

section.para: Once the guardian or parents details have been captured the 'PARENT' step will be removed from the top of the page. There will also be a message informing the student that since they are below a certain age (in this case 18) the parent or guardian that has been entered has been set as the payer. They can now proceed to payment page as normal.

caption.para: Summary page after the student has added their parent or guardians details

section.title: Payment
section.para: Once the student is on the 'PAYMENT' page there are two main ways to pay for their class/es, these are:

listitem.para: Pay using a credit or debit card

Click on the 'CorporatePass' option then they can enter their CorporatePass code in the field to complete the transaction without the need for a payment at this time (more information on this can be found in the Payment Options chapter of the web manual).

section.title: Confirmation
section.para: After the student has clicked on the 'Confirmed purchase' button at the bottom of the PAYMENT page, then they will be directed to a confirmation page with a message informing them that their online enrolment was either successful or rejected. If successful, at the bottom of the page there will be a continue button that if pressed will take them to a previously created post enrolment page that you would have created within the CMS. If you have not created a post enrolment page then they will just get re-directed to the courses page.
